entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
